sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import { FiPhone, FiMail, FiMapPin, FiClock, FiSend, FiMessageCircle } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { FaWhatsapp, FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaYoutube } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ContactUs = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission console.log('Form submitted:', formData); alert('Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; const locations = [ { name: 'Mobi repair Durgapur', address: 'Ananda Gopal, Bhiringi Girls school, Benachity, Durgapur, West Bengal 713213', city: 'Durgapur, West Bengal', phone: '+91 7407926912', email: 'support@mobirepair.com', hours: 'Mon-Sat: 10:30 AM - 09:30 PM', mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3888.0!2d77.2090!3d28.5355!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x0%3A0x0!2zMjjCsDMyJzA3LjgiTiA3N8KwMTInMzIuNCJF!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1234567890' } ]; return (
